languages.text: "Я обращусь к арбитрам — уверен, многие из них уже убедились, что префект манипулирует Лекс Империалис ради личных целей".
"I will appeal to the Arbitrators — I'm sure many of them are already convinced that the prefect is manipulating the Lex Imperialis for her own ends."
languages.original_text: "Я обращусь к арбитрам — уверен, многие из них уже убедились, что префект манипулирует Лекс Империалис ради личных целей".

traits.locale_text: "I will appeal to the Arbitrators — I'm sure many of them are already convinced that the prefect is manipulating the Lex Imperialis for her own ends."
"I will appeal to the Arbitrators — I'm sure many of them are already convinced that the prefect is manipulating the Lex Imperialis for her own ends."
"I will appeal to the Arbitrators — I'm sure many of them are already convinced that the prefect is manipulating the Lex Imperialis for her own ends."
"I will appeal to the Arbitrators — I'm sure many of them are already convinced that the prefect is manipulating the Lex Imperialis for her own ends."
"I will appeal to the Arbitrators — I'm sure many of them are already convinced that the prefect is manipulating the Lex Imperialis for her own ends."

languages.text: "Ich erhebe bei den Arbitratoren Einspruch ... Ich bin sicher, sie sind bereits überzeugt, dass die Präfektin das Lex Imperia zu ihren Gunsten manipuliert."
languages.original_text: "I will appeal to the Arbitrators — I'm sure many of them are already convinced that the prefect is manipulating the Lex Imperialis for her own ends."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erhebe bei den Arbitratoren Einspruch ... Ich bin sicher, sie sind bereits überzeugt, dass die Präfektin das Lex Imperia zu ihren Gunsten manipuliert."

languages.text: « Je vais faire appel aux arbitrators. Je suis sûr que nombre d'entre eux sont déjà convaincus que la préfète manipule la Lex Imperialis au service de ses propres intérêts. »
languages.original_text: "I will appeal to the Arbitrators — I'm sure many of them are already convinced that the prefect is manipulating the Lex Imperialis for her own ends."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais faire appel aux arbitrators. Je suis sûr que nombre d'entre eux sont déjà convaincus que la préfète manipule la Lex Imperialis au service de ses propres intérêts. »

languages.text: “我会呼吁其他法务官站在我们这边。行政官为了自己的目的，悍然歪曲帝国法典，我相信他们之中很多人已经看清了真相。”
languages.original_text: "I will appeal to the Arbitrators — I'm sure many of them are already convinced that the prefect is manipulating the Lex Imperialis for her own ends."

traits.locale_text: “我会呼吁其他法务官站在我们这边。行政官为了自己的目的，悍然歪曲帝国法典，我相信他们之中很多人已经看清了真相。”

languages.text: «Apelaré a los Arbitrator; no me cabe duda de que muchos de ellos saben que la prefecta está manipulando la Lex Imperialis para satisfacer sus intereses».
languages.original_text: "I will appeal to the Arbitrators — I'm sure many of them are already convinced that the prefect is manipulating the Lex Imperialis for her own ends."

traits.locale_text: «Apelaré a los Arbitrator; no me cabe duda de que muchos de ellos saben que la prefecta está manipulando la Lex Imperialis para satisfacer sus intereses».

languages.text: 「私がアービトレイターたちに訴えます。総監が自身の目的のためにレックス・インペリアを操っていると、多くの者がすでに確信しているはずですから」
languages.original_text: "I will appeal to the Arbitrators — I'm sure many of them are already convinced that the prefect is manipulating the Lex Imperialis for her own ends."

traits.locale_text: 「私がアービトレイターたちに訴えます。総監が自身の目的のためにレックス・インペリアを操っていると、多くの者がすでに確信しているはずですから」

languages.text: "Yargıcılarla konuşacağım... Prefektin Lex İmperialis'i kendi çıkarları doğrultusunda manipüle ettiği hususunda pek çoğu hemfikirdir sanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I will appeal to the Arbitrators — I'm sure many of them are already convinced that the prefect is manipulating the Lex Imperialis for her own ends."

traits.locale_text: "Yargıcılarla konuşacağım... Prefektin Lex İmperialis'i kendi çıkarları doğrultusunda manipüle ettiği hususunda pek çoğu hemfikirdir sanıyorum."
